Package com.flipfit.dao

Interface CustomerDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerDAOImpl
public interface CustomerDAOInterface
Author:
Dhruv Data Access Object (DAO) interface for customer-related operations. This interface defines the contract for interacting with the data source to handle all customer functionalities, such as searching for gyms, booking slots, and managing their personal bookings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    bookSlot(String gymId, String slotId, String email, Date date)
    Books a time slot for a customer at a specific gym.

    Cancels an existing booking made by a customer.

  • Method Details

    • getGymInCity

      List<GymCenter> getGymInCity(String city)
      Retrieves a list of all gym centers located in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - The name of the city to search for.
      Returns:
      A List of GymCenter objects in the specified city.

    • getSlotInGym

      List<Slot> getSlotInGym(String gymId)
      Retrieves a list of all available time slots for a given gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym.
      Returns:
      A List of Slot objects associated with the gym.

    • isSlotBooked

      boolean isSlotBooked(String slotId, Date date)
      Checks if a specific time slot is fully booked on a given date.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique identifier of the slot.
      date - The date to check for booking availability.
      Returns:
      true if the slot is fully booked, false otherwise.

    • bookSlot

      int bookSlot(String gymId, String slotId, String email, Date date)
      Books a time slot for a customer at a specific gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym.
      slotId - The unique identifier of the slot to book.
      email - The email of the customer making the booking.
      date - The date for the booking.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the outcome of the booking (e.g., success, waitlist).

    • getBookings

      List<Booking> getBookings(String email)
      Retrieves a list of all bookings made by a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the customer.
      Returns:
      A List of Booking objects associated with the customer.

    • cancelBooking

      boolean cancelBooking(String bookingId, String email)
      Cancels an existing booking made by a customer.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The unique identifier of the booking to cancel.
      email - The email of the customer who made the booking.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully cancelled, false otherwise.
